subject: Football
Football (College)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Robert Griffin III edged out Stanford quarterback Andrew Luck to become the first winner of the most storied award in college sports in Baylor’s less-than-notable football history.
snippet: Robert Griffin III edged out Stanford quarterback Andrew Luck to become the first winner of the most storied award in college sports in Baylor’s less-than-notable football history.
